title: 看下错误报告
author: tyy545
txt_content:

Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// Don't do that.

Description: Initializing game

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
tyy545 发表于 2015-8-9 17:28
来个player api下载地址
就是上面那个暴力翻墙
算了再发一遍：http://www.dl4.9minecraft.net/index.php?act=dl&id=1424606167
解压后丢进mods文件夹

replies.author: 草
replies.txt_content:
========================================
        Smart Render could not find the required API "Client Player"!
        ----------------------------------------
        Download Player API core from:
                http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/738498-/
        and install it on your system to fix this specific problem.
        ========================================
一个叫Smart Render(灵活动作)的mod缺少其前置API“Player API core”
将它下载下来并放入mods文件夹即可
http://www.mediafire.com/?c6oeyx9m3bks3a7
(希望你能强行翻墙...)
